collection.quickTemplatesDesc: Select a pre-built test battery to get started quickly

verticalJump.description: Measure explosive lower body power with countermovement jump test

broadJump.description: Assess horizontal power production and lower body strength

sprint10m.description: Test acceleration and initial sprint speed over 10 meters

sprint30m.description: Evaluate maximum sprint speed and acceleration over 30 meters

vo2Max.description: Measure maximal oxygen uptake capacity for aerobic fitness

benchPress1RM.description: Test upper body maximal strength with bench press

squat1RM.description: Assess lower body maximal strength with back squat

deadlift1RM.description: Evaluate posterior chain strength with deadlift

pullUps.description: Test upper body pulling strength and endurance

plank.description: Measure core stability and isometric endurance

flexibility.description: Assess hamstring and lower back flexibility with sit-and-reach test

reactionTime.description: Test neuromuscular response time to visual stimuli

agility5105.description: Measure change of direction speed with 5-10-5 shuttle run

cooperTest.description: 12-minute run test for aerobic endurance assessment

yoyoTest.description: Intermittent recovery test for sport-specific endurance

custom.description: Custom test protocol defined by trainer

actions.whatNext: What would you like to do next?

tips.title: Pro Tip
tips.strength: Remember to schedule rest days between strength workouts for the same muscle groups. Consider creating a complementary conditioning workout for active recovery.
tips.conditioning: This workout can be used as active recovery between strength sessions. Track player heart rate data to optimize intensity zones.
tips.hybrid: Hybrid workouts are great for game-day preparation. Monitor player fatigue levels when combining strength and cardio.
tips.agility: Agility drills work best when players are fresh. Schedule these at the beginning of practice sessions.

smartDefaults.title: Smart Defaults
smartDefaults.learning: Smart defaults learn from your patterns and preferences over time
smartDefaults.preferencesDescription: Customize how smart defaults work for you

WORKOUT_NAME_REQUIRED.message: Please enter a name for your workout
WORKOUT_NAME_REQUIRED.helpText: Give your workout a descriptive name that helps identify its purpose

WORKOUT_NAME_TOO_SHORT.message: Workout name must be at least 3 characters
WORKOUT_NAME_TOO_SHORT.helpText: Use a descriptive name that clearly identifies the workout

WORKOUT_NAME_TOO_LONG.helpText: Keep the name concise while still being descriptive

NO_EXERCISES_SELECTED.message: Please add at least one exercise to the workout
NO_EXERCISES_SELECTED.helpText: A workout must contain at least one exercise

NO_PLAYERS_ASSIGNED.message: Please assign at least one player to this session
NO_PLAYERS_ASSIGNED.helpText: Select players who will participate in this training session

INVALID_DATE_RANGE.message: End date must be after start date
INVALID_DATE_RANGE.helpText: Make sure your session end time is later than the start time

DUPLICATE_EXERCISE.message: This exercise is already in the workout
DUPLICATE_EXERCISE.helpText: Each exercise should appear only once per workout

INVALID_SETS_VALUE.helpText: Enter a reasonable number of sets for this exercise
INVALID_SETS_VALUE.action: Enter a valid number of sets

INVALID_REPS_VALUE.helpText: Enter a reasonable number of repetitions
INVALID_REPS_VALUE.action: Enter a valid number of reps

INVALID_INTENSITY_VALUE.helpText: Enter the intensity as a percentage (1-100)

NO_INTERVALS_DEFINED.message: Please add at least one interval to the conditioning workout
NO_INTERVALS_DEFINED.helpText: A conditioning workout needs at least one work interval

NO_DRILLS_DEFINED.message: Please add at least one drill to the agility workout
NO_DRILLS_DEFINED.helpText: An agility workout needs at least one drill to practice

NO_BLOCKS_DEFINED.message: Please add at least one block to the hybrid workout
NO_BLOCKS_DEFINED.helpText: A hybrid workout needs at least one exercise or interval block

CONNECTION_FAILED.message: Unable to connect to the server
CONNECTION_FAILED.helpText: Check your internet connection and try again

TIMEOUT.message: The request took too long to complete
TIMEOUT.helpText: The server may be busy. Please try again in a moment

SERVER_ERROR.message: An error occurred on the server
SERVER_ERROR.helpText: This is a temporary issue. Our team has been notified

NOT_FOUND.message: The requested resource was not found
NOT_FOUND.helpText: The workout or session may have been deleted

UNAUTHORIZED.message: You are not authorized to perform this action
UNAUTHORIZED.helpText: Your session may have expired. Please log in again

FORBIDDEN.message: You do not have permission to access this resource
FORBIDDEN.helpText: Contact your administrator if you need access

INSUFFICIENT_ROLE.message: Your role does not allow this action
INSUFFICIENT_ROLE.helpText: Only Physical Trainers can manage workouts

SCHEDULE_CONFLICT.message: This time slot conflicts with another session
SCHEDULE_CONFLICT.helpText: Check the calendar for available time slots

PLAYER_UNAVAILABLE.message: One or more players are not available at this time

DUPLICATE_SESSION.message: A similar session already exists at this time
DUPLICATE_SESSION.helpText: You may have already created this session

RESOURCE_LOCKED.message: This workout is currently being edited by another user
RESOURCE_LOCKED.helpText: Wait a moment and try again

MEDICAL_RESTRICTION.message: This exercise is restricted for some players
MEDICAL_RESTRICTION.helpText: Check player medical reports for exercise restrictions

INJURY_RISK.message: This workout may pose injury risk for some players
INJURY_RISK.helpText: Consider modifying intensity or choosing alternative exercises

NO_MEDICAL_CLEARANCE.message: Some players need medical clearance for this activity
NO_MEDICAL_CLEARANCE.helpText: Contact medical staff for player clearance

RECOVERY_PERIOD.message: Player is still in recovery period
RECOVERY_PERIOD.helpText: This player needs more recovery time before intense training

UNKNOWN_ERROR.helpText: Please try again. If the problem persists, contact support

DATA_CORRUPTION.helpText: Your data may be corrupted. Please contact support

VALIDATION_ERROR.helpText: One or more fields contain invalid data

success.offlineQueued: Workout saved offline - will sync when connection restored

errors.networkError: Network error - please check your connection

faq.howToCreateWorkout: How do I create a new workout?
faq.howToCreateWorkoutAnswer: Click the 'Create Workout' button or press Ctrl+N. Choose your workout type and follow the guided builder.
faq.whatAreMedicalRestrictionsAnswer: Medical restrictions are limitations set by medical staff to prevent injury. The system automatically filters unsafe exercises.
faq.howToShareTemplates: How do I share templates with other trainers?
faq.howToShareTemplatesAnswer: Save your workout as a template, then use the share button to grant access to specific trainers or teams.
faq.howToTrackProgress: How do I track player progress?
faq.howToTrackProgressAnswer: View the Player Status tab for real-time wellness data, or check Analytics for detailed performance trends.
faq.whatIsLiveSession: What is a live training session?
faq.whatIsLiveSessionAnswer: Live sessions allow real-time monitoring of players during workouts. Players broadcast their data while you monitor progress.
